LanguageData.OE_Ghoul.label: Ghoul
LanguageData.OE_Ghoul.description: Ghouls were once humans who failed to get into a protective shelter during the bombing. Irradiation has given them increased resistance to radiation; they also gain a bonus to resistance to poison. Unfortunately, they are too physically weak to use heavy weapons.
LanguageData.OE_MisterHandy.label: Mister Handy
